Question: MindMics Inc. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
MindMics, Inc.

Product: MindMics Heart Health System

- Infrasonic sound-based technology for in-ear earphones and hearables
- Patented Infrasonic Hemodynography (IH) for health monitoring through TWS earbuds
- Captures biosignals below 20 Hz with high-performance microphones
- Conducts high-level analytics in the cloud for real-time heartbeat analysis
- Mobile app offers biofeedback and intuitive dashboard for real-time physiological states
- Science-backed tools including breathwork for mastering physiological control
- Clinically validated to detect biometrics at sub-heart rate fidelity
- Provides tangential health information for various markets
- Website: www.mindmics.com
Summary_cn:
MindMics公司

产品：MindMics心脏健康系统

- 基于次声波技术的入耳式耳机和可听设备
- 通过TWS耳塞使用专利的次声波血液动力图（IH）进行健康监测
- 使用高性能麦克风捕捉低于20 Hz的生物信号
- 在云端进行高级分析，实时分析心跳
- 移动应用程序提供生物反馈和直观的仪表盘，实时显示生理状况
- 科学支持的工具，包括呼吸练习，用于掌握生理控制
- 临床验证，能够以亚心率准确度检测生物特征
- 为各个市场提供相关的健康信息
- 网站：www.mindmics.com
